spatialData

spatialData provides ready-to-use spatial datasets for ecological and environmental modeling in R. Each dataset includes pre-processed response variables and environmental predictors, making it easy to jump straight into species distribution modeling, biodiversity analysis, or spatial statistics.

Installation

You can install the development version of spatialData from GitHub:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("blasbenito/spatialData")

Datasets

Dataset Description Records Responses Predictors Article
neanderthal Neanderthal presence/absence records with paleoclimate and topographic predictors 245 1 25 link
quercus European oak species distribution records with bioclimatic and land cover predictors 6,728 1 31 link
vi Global NDVI records with climate, soil, and topographic predictors 9,265 5 58 link
plantae Plant diversity metrics for global ecoregions with environmental predictors 662 53 96 –

All datasets are sf data frames with point or polygon geometries, loaded lazily via data().
